description: After a beautiful breakfast idea? Make mouths water with this waffle breakfast platter. With so many tasty toppings there's something for everyone.
name: Waffle Breakfast Platter Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Arrange waffles, fruit, yoghurt and berry compote on a large platter. Scatter over coconut. Drizzle waffles with a little syrup. Serve with remaining syrup.
